game.name: BoobyRogue: Tumor Takedown
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: BoobyRogue: Tumor Takedown 은 빠른 속도의 2D 로그라이크 게임으로, 플레이어는 영웅을 선택해 유방암과의 상징적인 전투 속에서 몰려오는 적들을 상대합니다. 무기와 아이템을 모으고, 독창적인 빌드를 만들어, 최종 종양에 도달할 때까지 생존하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: BoobyRogue: Tumor Takedown is a fast-paced 2D roguelike where you choose your hero and fight through waves of enemies in a symbolic battle against breast cancer. Collect weapons and items, create unique builds, and survive until the final Tumor.
